name: cleaning house
description:
cleaning house.

controls:
on pc, use arrow keys to move.
on smartphone, swipe to move.
walk up to an item to interact with it. 

made in bitsy. please play in your browser!

other things i've worked on can be found here! you can comment right here or on twitter/tumblr with your thoughts. if you like my work and want to support me, you can buy me a coffee!
